mapper.select: SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_NAME, COOK_INGRE FROM T4_RECIPE AS R INNER JOIN T4_R_PURPOSE AS P ON R.RECIPE_NO = P.RECIPE_NO INNER JOIN T4_HOWTO AS H ON R.RECIPE_NO = H.RECIPE_NO INNER JOIN T4_INGREDIENT AS I ON R.RECIPE_NO = I.RECIPE_NO INNER JOIN T4_TOOL AS T ON R.RECIPE_NO = T.RECIPE_NO WHERE P.CODE = 'SNA' AND H.CODE = 'ETC' AND I.CODE = 'VEG' AND T.CODE = 'OVE';
